name: Dino Pet Walker
description:
Your mission is to walk the pet to the bandstand in the botton left of the park.
The quality of your work goes up with time and goes down when your pet misbehaves or gets wet. If you scold it too much, the dino will get out of control, keep close to it to regain control.

W/A/S/D - Movement
E - Scold the pet to come to you

Unfortunately there is a bug and the character can't get inside the bandstand.
Use ALT+F4 to close the game. We forgot the pause menu.
